frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No technical knowledge required. Setup is conversational - just tell the AI about your business.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: You own your data completely. We provide export tools and delete all data within 30 days of cancellation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How does WhatsApp integration work?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Customers message your business WhatsApp number, and AI handles bookings, inquiries, and follow-ups automatically.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I add more businesses later?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, additional locations are $29/month each with the same full feature set.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is my business data secure?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, each business gets a private AI instance with enterprise-grade security and encryption.
